Performance¶

Benchmarks¶

Running redccd:
  • 15 FLAT
  • 11 BIAS
  • 37 OBJECT
  • 50 COMP

Command time redccd

real    1m53.831s

user    1m28.863s

sys     0m20.969s

time redspec

real    1m10.221s

user    1m38.899s

sys     0m2.404s

Wavelength Calibration¶

For the same night the average RMS Error for 31 lamps was 0.2861 Angstrom.
